name: イース バトル・スペシャル
summary:
A collection of boss battle BGM arrangements from Ys I-V, also featuring guitar performance by Toshinori Hiramatsu (1,3,6,9,10).  This album was recorded on a CD-R.

Tracks 1, 7: Ys II
Tracks 2, 4: Ys
Tracks 3, 8: Ys IV
Tracks 5, 6: Ys V
Tracks 9, 10: Ys III
info:
• 别名: Ys Battle Special
  • 发售日期: 2002
  • 播放时长: 45:03
  • 碟片数量: 1
